entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
